alert.note: Alert for Henderson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 01 at 5:28AM EDT until April 02 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Henderson County. * WHEN...From 8 AM Saturday to midnight EDT Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind gusts in excess of 60 mph will be possible in elevations above 4000 feet.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
